TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 检索或生成代码以检索 Web.config 文件的 <> 节中的值。

span.span: Retrieves, or generates code to retrieve, values from the <> section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供对中的值访问``Web.config 文件部分。The class provides access to values in the `` section of the Web.config file. ``的 Web.config 文件部分包含名称/值对中的连接字符串值。The `` section of the Web.config file contains connection string values in name/value pairs. 通过分配形式的表达式来检索连接字符串值A connection string value is retrieved by assigning an expression of the form `<%$ ConnectionStrings: secureConnectionString %>` 给控件属性。to a control property. 冒号 （:） 前面的表达式的一部分后冒号表示名称的连接字符串指定要检索的表达式和该部件的类型。The part of the expression before the colon (:) designates the type of expression to be retrieved, and the part after the colon signifies the name of the connection string. 前面的表达式将从 Web.config 文件中检索以下值。The preceding expression would retrieve the following value from the Web.config file. `` `` `` 当页分析器遇到具有前缀的表达式`ConnectionStrings`，它创建的实例类来处理该表达式。When the page parser encounters an expression with the prefix `ConnectionStrings`, it creates an instance of the class to handle the expression. 如果将编译的页中遇到这种表达式对象生成的 Web.config 文件中检索指定的连接字符串的代码。If the expression is encountered in a page that will be compiled, the object generates code that retrieves the specified connection string from the Web.config file. 如果将编译的页中遇到这种表达式对象在分析页时从 Web.config 文件返回值。If the expression is encountered in a page that will not be compiled, the object returns the value from the Web.config file when the page is parsed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用控件以从运行 Microsoft SQL Server 的计算机中检索数据，并将其显示在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively use a control to retrieve data from a computer running Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/CS/sql3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/VB/sql3vb.aspx#1)] 代码在 Web.config 文件中检索以下连接字符串。The code retrieves the following connection string from the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` ``

span.span: ASP.NET Expressions Overview

summary.span: 从 Web.config 文件的 <> 节返回一个值。

returns.span: 与 Web.config 文件的 <> 节中某个键关联的 。

span.span: The associated with a key in the <> section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 形式的表达式时调用此方法`<%$ ConnectionStrings: secureConnectionString %>`遇到未编译页面中。This method is called when an expression of the form `<%$ ConnectionStrings: secureConnectionString %>` is encountered in a page that is not compiled. 它将检索相应的值从``Web.config 文件部分。It retrieves the appropriate value from the `` section of the Web.config file. 此方法重写方法通过调用方法，如果连接字符串中包含`parsedData`参数，或通过调用方法，如果连接字符串未包含在`parsedData`参数。This method overrides the method by calling the method if a connection string is included in the `parsedData` parameter, or by calling the method if a connection string is not included in the `parsedData` parameter.

exception.span: 未能在 Web.config 文件中找到连接字符串名称。

span.span: The connection string name could not be found in the Web.config file.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示是否可在不编译的页中计算表达式。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that is not compiled.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否方法已在类中实现。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class. 必须在表达式的表达式生成器来在不编译页中计算实现。 must be implemented within an expression builder for an expression to be evaluated in a page that is not compiled. 因此支持的连接字符串的非编译计算`true`始终会返回。 supports no-compile evaluation of connection strings, so `true` is always returned.
